5914.name: Unknown
5914.message:
You cannot add any more communities
for this game to your favorites.

To add a new favorite, you must
remove at least one community for
this game from your favorites.
5914.short_description: Favorites for this game are full.
5914.long_description: The maximum of communities from your favourites has been reached, making impossible adding new ones.
5914.short_solution: Remove a community for this game from your favorites.
5914.long_solution: Remove an existing community for this game from your favourites and try again.
